DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Lymph Node Largest Transverse Diameter CM Measurement
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Indicate the transverse diameter of the largest[+] para-aortic node measured in cm.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Diagnostic Imaging Breast Laterality Category
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Name of the side of the body that was targeted in a breast imaging study.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Imaging data collection

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Diagnostic Imaging Procedure Modality Name
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text term to identify the type of medical imaging procedure that was performed on a patient.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Imaging data collection

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Magnetic Resonance Imaging Enhancement Category
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text term to describe the extent of breast parenchymal enhancement that occurs during MRI imaging.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Imaging data collection

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Primary Lesion Present Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text indicator of whether the primary lesion is still present at the time of assessment.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Imaging data collection

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Carcinoma Primary Lesion Type
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Name that is descriptive of a primary breast carcinoma lesion.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Imaging data collection

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Carcinoma Primary Lesion Anatomic Site
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Anatomic site description of a breast carcinoma primary lesion.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Imaging data collection

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Tumor Change Category
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Classification based on tumor changes since the last imaging study.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Imaging data collection

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Additional Lesion Present Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text indicator to signify whether lesions other than the primary lesion are present at the time of an assessment.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: 6/12/17 jk CDE versioned for use of Standard Y/N VD to allow reuse by other contexts (DCP-NWU2015-06-04). --- Curated for BOLD Imaging data collection

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Carcinoma Associated Finding Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text indicator for presence of findings related to skin and surrounding structure changes due to breast carcinoma.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Imaging data collection

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Carcinoma Associated Finding Type
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text descriptor of findings related to skin and surrounding structure changes due to breast carcinoma.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Imaging data collection

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Lymphadenopathy Imaging Finding Type
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text term to define an imaging finding of lymphadenopathy.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Imaging data collection

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Lymph Node Longest Diameter Measurement
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Value in millimeters to represent the longest diameter of a lymph node.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Imaging data collection

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Lymphadenopathy Last Diagnostic Imaging Change Category
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Classification of the modification in abnormal lymph node enlargement since the last imaging study.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Imaging data collection

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Diagnostic Imaging Assessment Category
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Classification of the summary assessment based on an imaging study(ies).
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Imaging data collection

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Diagnostic Imaging Assessment Recommendation Type
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text recommendation formulated as a result of imaging study(ies) with implications for follow-up.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Imaging data collection

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Diagnostic Imaging Assessment Other Recommendation Specify Text
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text description of a response of 'other' for a recommendation to an individual after a medical imaging study(ies).
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Imaging data collection

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Carcinoma Radiation Therapy Type
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text name for a radiation therapy procedure used for treatment of breast carcinoma.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated as part of Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Total Dose Prior To Radiation Therapy Boost Value
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Numeric value for the full dose of irradiation delivered to the whole breast or chest wall prior to administration of a boost.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated as part of Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Boost Anatomic Site
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text name of the anatomic site targeted for an irradiation boost.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated as part of Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Boost Administration Timepoint Name
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Identification of the timepoint in reference to other treatment(s) in which an irradiation boost is administered.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated as part of Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Boost Administration Method Type
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text name of the type of radiation therapy method (irradiation source) used to administer an irradiation boost.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: 2021-4-1 ak New version created due to VD max length change.

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Lymph Node Radiation Therapy Administered Total Dose
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the total dose of radiation delivery in Gray (Gy) unit of measure delivered to a lymph node region.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated as part of Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Partial Breast Radiation Therapy Administered Total Dose
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the total dose of breast partial radiation delivery in Gray (Gy) unit of measure.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated as part of Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Partial Breast Radiation Therapy Total Fraction Count
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Quantity to represent the total number of radiation therapy fractions delivered during partial breast irradiation.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated as part of Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Partial Breast Radiation Therapy Administration Method Type
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text name for a partial breast irradiation modality/method used to deliver irradiation.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated as part of Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Ipsilateral Breast Carcinoma Present Diagnosis Count
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Value to represent the number of ipsilateral breast tumors present at the time of diagnosis.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Neoplasm Anatomic Site Quadrant Name
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Name of the breast quadrant or structure in which a tumor is located.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Unresectable Inoperable Malignant Neoplasm Present Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text indicator to signify whether a tumor is unable to be removed surgically, or is not suitable for surgery based on factors such as histology and disease extent.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Preoperative Neoadjuvant Therapy Occurrence Yes No Unknown Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text indicator to signify whether an individual received any preoperative neoadjuvant therapy.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Preoperative Neoadjuvant Therapy Type
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Name of the preoperative neoadjuvant modality administered to a patient.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Primary Surgical Procedure Performed Type
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Name of the most extensive definitive operative procedure performed on an individual with breast carcinoma.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Prophylactic Contralateral Mastectomy Performed Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text indicator to signify whether a prophylactic contralateral mastectomy was performed, resulting in a bilateral mastectomy.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Carcinoma Margin Involvement Type
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Identification of the extent of margin involvement with breast carcinoma based on an operative procedure.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Carcinoma Surgical Procedure Margin Histology Type
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Name of the histologic category of breast carcinoma detected in the surgical margins.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Carcinoma Surgical Procedure Less Than 2 Millimeter Involvement Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text indicator to signify whether tumor is less than 2 millimeters from the surgical margin(s).
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Surgical Procedure Breast Reconstruction Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text indicator to signify whether a patient had breast reconstruction.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Reconstruction Delay Day Count
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Number of days delay in a surgical procedure
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Surgical Procedure Breast Reconstruction Procedure Name
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Name of the breast reconstructive procedure used for a patient.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Carcinoma Lymph Node largest Metastasis Diameter Category
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Classification to represent the largest nodal site of metastasis in an individual with breast carcinoma.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative.dmr.

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Total Breast Carcinoma Lymph Node Visual Count
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Value to represent the number of visualized macrometastatic sites of breast carcinoma within the lymph nodes.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative.dmr.

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Lymph Node Involvement Category
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Classification of the summary result of lymph node involvement with carcinoma.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative.dmr.

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Largest Metastasis Lymph Node Size Value
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Numeric value for the largest metastatic lymph node site of involvement by size and assay method.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Registration To Event Calculation Day Month Duration Value
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Calculation of the time (in days/months) from the registration of an individual to a clinical trial to another protocol-related event.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative.dmr.

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Most Extensive Surgical Procedure To Event Calculation Day Month Duration Value
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Calculation of the time (in days/months) from an individual's most extensive surgical procedure to a protocol-related event.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative.dmr.

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Randomization To Event Calculation Day Month Duration Value
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Calculation of the time (in days/months) from an individual's randomization to a clinical trial to another protocol-related event.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative.dmr.

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Lymphatic Invasion Carcinoma Surgical Procedure Involvement Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text indicator to signify the presence of tumor invasion within lymphatic vessels.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Lymph Node Prior To Treatment Sampling Yes No Character Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text indicator to signify whether lymph node sampling was done before preoperative systemic therapy was started.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Cancer Histology Category
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Classification of the type of invasive breast carcinoma diagnosed based on histologic attributes.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Preoperative Therapeutic Effect Anatomic Site
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Anatomic site showing therapeutic effects of preoperative therapy through tissue sampling.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Carcinoma Residual Disease Overall Cellularity Percentage Value
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the overall degree of cancer cellularity during an evaluation of breast carcinoma residual disease.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Ductal Breast Carcinoma In Situ Percentage Value
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to capture the percentage of in situ disease in a measurement of residual cancer burden in the breast.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Diagnostic Imaging Other Modality Text
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text to describe a method of medical imaging that is different from the options that exist.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Imaging data collection

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Imaging Technology Session Most Recent Date
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Any of a number of technologies that permits the visualization and acquisition of images into a physical or electronic record.:Time, period, or term devoted to some activity._The particular day, month and year an event will happen or has happened._Nearest to the present._Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Imaging data collection

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Ultrasound Imaging Lymph Node Status
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text term to describe the appearance of lymph nodes evaluated by ultrasonography.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Imaging data collection

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Carcinoma Neoplasm Singularity Status
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text term to represent the occurrence pattern of a breast tumor.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Primary Surgical Procedure Performed Other Specify Text
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Description of the most extensive definitive operative procedure performed on an individual with breast carcinoma that is not part of a set of options.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Clip Placement Prior To Preoperative Therapy Yes No Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Indicator to signify whether a clip or marker was placed at the site of the primary tumor before preoperative therapy was administered.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Specimen Radiograph At Definitive Surgical Procedure Yes No Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Indicator to signify whether an xray/radiograph was taken at the time of primary surgery.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Specimen Radiograph Clip Visibility Yes No Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Indicator to signify whether a clip or marker that was placed at the time of primary surgery is visible on radiograph.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Residual Primary Tumor Post Surgical Procedure Category
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Value to represent the number of residual primary tumors present.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Residual Tumors Post Surgical Procedure Assessment Text
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text narrative to describe residual primary tumors.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Residual Malignant Neoplasm Post Surgical Procedure Longest Measurement
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Measurement of largest residual invasive cancer site in millimeters
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Tumor Infiltrating Lymphocyte Level Category
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text term to describe the extent of lymphocyte infiltration into tumor.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Lymph Node Anatomic Site
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Identification of lymph node sites targeted for radiation therapy.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support the Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) initiative.

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Tumor Post Neoadjuvant Clinical T Stage
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Code to represent the post-neoadjuvant clinical T (tumor) stage of a breast tumor, as defined by the AJCC Cancer Staging Manual, 7th Ed.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast carcinoma Post Neoadjuvant Therapy Pathologic T Stage
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Code to represent the post-neoadjuvant therapy pathologic T stage for a breast tumor as defined by the AJCC Cancer Staging Manual, 7th Ed.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Carcinoma Residual Disease Overall Cellularity Percentage Value
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Numeric entry to represent the estimated percent of the final primary tumor bed that contains residual cancer that is different from the options given.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Carcinoma In Situ Cellularity Percentage Value
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Numeric entry to represent the estimated percent of the final primary tumor bed that contains In Situ cancer that is different from the options given.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Tumor Clinical Tumor Stage
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Code to identify the clinical T (tumor) stage of a breast tumor, as defined by the AJCC Cancer Staging Manual, 7th Ed.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Tumor Clinical N Stage
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Code to represent the clinical N (nodal) stage of a breast tumor, as defined by the AJCC Cancer Staging Manual, 7th Ed.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Carcinoma Estrogen Receptor Status
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Term or code to represent the overall result of Estrogen Receptor (ER) testing.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support NCI BOLD Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Progesterone Tissue Receptor Status
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Progesterone Tissue Receptor Status
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support NCI BOLD Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Cytogenetics HER2/neu Polyclonal Antibody Status
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text or code to represent result of an immunohistochemistry procedure to identify presence of the ERBB2 gene (marker for breast cancer) in tissue using a heterogeneous antibody produced by a host organism.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support NCI BOLD Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: FISH Cytology Result Status
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text term or code to represent the result of HER2 testing by fluorescence in situ hybridization (FISH) testing.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support NCI BOLD Initiative. Removed QIN classification.

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Tubular Pattern Formation Percentage Category
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation combining three histologic reporting elements, tubulin formation, nuclear pleomorphism and mitotic count, to determine the grade of breast cancer.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support NCI BOLD Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Tumor Pathologic Node Stage Code
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Code to represent the pathologic N stage of a breast tumor.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: 1/31/19 jk released per prior note as part of qrtly metric review.  10/3/17 jk versioned to use new version of AJCC VD updated 6/5/2017 as part of quarterly context content review per Jennifer Hayes.  5/29/2013 dr Curated to support NCI BOLD Initiative

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Clockface or Region Hour Unknown Location Yes No Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: An indicator of whether the positive finding location identifier based on (when provided) clockface numbering is unknown.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative.dmr

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Tumor Post Neoadjuvant Therapy AJCC Edition 7 Clinical N Stage
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Stage related to post-neoadjuvant therapy clinical N stage for a breast tumor, the extent of lymph node involvement of a malignant neoplasm of the breast based on clinical observation using the TNM AJCC v7 classification system as they pertain to staging of regional lymph nodes.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support BOLD Preoperative CRF.

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Chest Wall Re-excision Performed Yes No Unknown Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether another excision of the breast and/or chest wall was necessary for a patient.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support v2.0 BOLD CRF based on revisions from reviewers.5.13.2016.dmr

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Breast Negative Surgical Margin Tumor Dimension Value
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Numeric millimeter value to describe the size of a breast tumor with negative surgical margins.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support v2.0 BOLD CRF based on revisions from reviewers.5.13.2016.dmr

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Most Recent Surgical Procedure Mammoplasty Performed Date
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Latest or most recent date of surgical mammoplasty to rebuild a breast's shape after a mastectomy, as a treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support v2.0 BOLD CRF based on revisions from reviewers.5.13.2016.dmr

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Complete Continuing Planned Status Yes No Unknown Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify that a regimen of exposure of a body site(s) to radiation therapy has been completed, is ongoing or is planned.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support v2.0 BOLD CRF based on revisions from reviewers.5.13.2016.dmr

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Lymph Node Radiation Therapy Administered Fractions Count
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Quantity to represent the total number of radiation therapy fractions delivered during regional lymph node irradiation.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support v2.0 BOLD CRF based on revisions from reviewers.5.13.2016.dmr

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Partial Breast Radiation Therapy Daily Fraction Count
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Quantity to represent the number of radiation therapy fractions delivered daily during partial breast irradiation.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated to support v2.0 BOLD CRF based on revisions from reviewers.5.13.2016.dmr

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Total Dose Prior To Radiation Therapy Boost Known Yes No Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether the total dose of radiation therapy administered in advance of a radiation boost is known.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Radiation CRF to allow numeric fields of dose and fraction # to include the option to collect an unknown response.5.6.2016.dmr

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Total Fractions Known Yes No Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether the total number of radiation fractions administered in advance of a radiation boost is known.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Radiation CRF to allow numeric fields of dose and fraction # to include the option to collect an unknown response.5.6.2016.dmr

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Total Radiation Therapy Boost Dose Known Yes No Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether the total dose of radiation therapy administered to a radiation boost field is known.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Radiation CRF to allow numeric fields of dose and fraction # to include the option to collect an unknown response.5.6.2016.dmr

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Lumpectomy Chest Wall Total Fractions Known Yes No Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether the total number of radiation fractions administered in a boost field to a lumpectomy or chest well is known.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Radiation CRF to allow numeric fields of dose and fraction # to include the option to collect an unknown response.5.6.2016.dmr

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Lymph Node Radiation Therapy Total Dose Known Yes No Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether the total dose of radiation therapy administered to targeted regional lymph nodes is known.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Radiation CRF to allow numeric fields of dose and fraction # to include the option to collect an unknown response.5.6.2016.dmr

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Lymph Node Radiation Therapy Total Fraction Known Yes No Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether the total number of radiation fractions administered to targeted regional lymph nodes is known.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Radiation CRF to allow numeric fields of dose and fraction # to include the option to collect an unknown response.5.6.2016.dmr

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Partial Breast Radiation Therapy Total Dose Known Yes No Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether the total dose of radiation therapy administered during partial breast irradiation is known.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Radiation CRF to allow numeric fields of dose and fraction # to include the option to collect an unknown response.5.6.2016.dmr

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Partial Breast Radiation Therapy Total Fractions Known Yes No Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether the total number of radiation fractions administered during partial breast irradiation is known.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Radiation CRF to allow numeric fields of dose and fraction # to include the option to collect an unknown response.5.6.2016.dmr

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Partial Breast Radiation Therapy Daily Fractions Known Yes No Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether the number of radiation fractions administered each day during partial breast irradiation is known.
DataElementQueryResults.changeNote: Curated for BOLD Radiation CRF to allow numeric fields of dose and fraction # to include the option to collect an unknown response.5.6.2016.dmr
